title: Emily Blunt Arrives at Meche Salon – September 4
content:
Actress Emily Blunt returns back to her car after spending some time at Meche Salon to get her hair done. Emily walked out with noticeable blonde streaks in her hair to give herself a lighter cute look. 
 
   
 
The post Emily Blunt Arrives at Meche Salon – September 4 appeared first on Emily Blunt Web .
